title: U.S. trade deficit rises - but not with China
text:
U.S. trade deficit rises - but not with China 5:08pm BST - 01:51 
The U.S. trade deficit increased to a near 9-1/2-year high in February, with both exports and imports rising to record highs, but the shortfall with China narrowed sharply. David Pollard reports.   
The U.S. trade deficit increased to a near 9-1/2-year high in February, with both exports and imports rising to record highs, but the shortfall with China narrowed sharply. David Pollard reports.  //reut.rs/2q79Tz9
